Hello,

I just found a webpage in our archives that contains a robots metat=
ag saying 

<meta name=3D"robots" content=3D"noindex,noarchive,nofollow" />=


The page was harvested using the classic robots policy. As a result, I th=
ink pages with 'noarchive' set should not appear in our archives. Is this a=
 bug or am I mistaken?
The site was harvested with WCT 1.4.1. I think that =
uses Heritrix 1.4.2? 

Thanks, Ren=E9
